alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 1:41PM CDT until March 25 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/. * At 241 PM EDT/141 PM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located near Cottonwood, and moving east at 30 mph. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Malone, Madrid, Gordon, Campbellton, Jakin, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Garretts Crossroads, Little Hope, Southern Junction, Keytons, Riverturn, Ellaville, Steam Mill, Howards Mill and Lovetown.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
